purpleculture_pinyin:
dié
to fold; to fold over in layers; to furl; to layer; to pile up; to repeat; to duplicate
свернуть; складывать слоями; свернуть; наслоить; накапливаться; повторять; дублировать

heisig_chinese_memo: The think tank always has a lot of topics to discuss and the person with the best idea gets to pick one out of the heap of fake crowns on the shelf to wear as a funny reward.
Ru_trainchinese: dié: (глаг) складывать, сгибать; складывать (в кучу, стопку); повторяться
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The king uses a mulberry tree to make a shelf.  Then puts a heap of diamonds on teh shelf and rests his crown on top.
humanum_full_description_en:
From three " fields " to " yi ", the original meaning is overlap. "Shuowen": "Yang Xiong said that he thought that the official condemnation of Gu Li was three days, and it was appropriate to get it. From the crystal to the appropriate. After the new, he thought that the three days were too prosperous and changed to Sanda." "Selected Works‧Zhang Heng <Xijing "Fu": "The gods rise from their special characteristics, and the wells are stacked and multiplied." Lu Xiang's note: "Folding means overlapping buildings."

" Stacked " can mean succession. Tang Fangqian "Send to Taizhou Sun in One Hundred Articles": "Acacia is not surprised that the sound of the book is late, and the bird will still have to fly in the sun."

" Stacked " said folding. Tang Zhang Zhuo, "Youxianku": "Luochuan returns to the snow, it's only worth folding clothes."

" Stacking " also means vibration and perk. "Selected Works‧ Zuo Si"Wu Du Fu": "Zhenggu stacked mountains, Huo Lie Lin."

Liu Kui's note: "Folding, vibration." Li Zhouhan's note: "Folding, drum vibration."

" Stack " can also be used as a quantifier to indicate layers, used for overlapping and accumulating things. "Selected Works‧ Zuo Si "Wu Du Fu": "Although the leaves are stacked, the rich and the strong one after another." Li Zhouhan's note: "Folding, heavy...Although the king and hegemony's deeds are stacked with hundreds of leaves, they are endless ."
humanum_short_description_en: From three " fields " to " yi ", the original meaning is overlap.
humanum_full_description:
從三「田」，從「宜」，本義為重疊。《說文》：「楊雄說以爲古理官決罪三日，得其宜乃行之。从晶从宜。亡新以爲曡从三日太盛，改爲三田。」《文選‧張衡〈西京賦〉》：「神明崛其特起，井幹疊而百增。」呂向注：「疊，謂樓形重疊。」

　　「疊」可表示接連。唐方干〈寄臺州孫從事百篇〉：「相思莫訝音書晚，鳥去猶須疊日飛。」

　　「疊」也表示折疊。唐張鷟〈游仙窟〉：「洛川迴雪，只堪使疊衣裳。」

　　「疊」還表示振動、振作。《文選‧左思〈吳都賦〉》：「鉦鼓疊山，火烈熛林。」

　　劉逵注：「疊，振疊也。」李周翰注：「疊，鼓聲振動也。」

　　「疊」也可做量詞，表示層，用於重疊、纍積的東西。《文選‧左思〈吳都賦〉》：「雖累葉百疊，而富彊相繼。」李周翰注：「疊，重也……言王霸之業雖疊葉百重，而富彊不絕。」
humanum_short_description: 從三「田」，從「宜」，本義為重疊。

Chinese: The think tank always has a lot of topics to discuss and the person with the best idea gets to pick one out of the heap of fake crowns on the shelf to wear as a funny reward.
Meaning: heap
Hanzi: 叠
Story: The king uses a mulberry tree to make a shelf. Then puts a heap of diamonds on teh shelf and rests his crown on top.
Kind: traditional

From the crystal to the appropriate. After the new, he thought that the three days were too prosperous and changed to Sanda." "Selected Works‧Zhang Heng " Stacked" can mean succession. Tang Fangqian "Send to Taizhou Sun in One Hundred Articles": "Acacia is not surprised that the sound of the book is late, and the bird will still have to fly in the sun." " Stacked" said folding. Tang Zhang Zhuo, "Youxianku": "Luochuan returns to the snow, it's only worth folding clothes." " Stacking" also means vibration and perk. "Selected Works‧ Zuo Si"Wu Du Fu": "Zhenggu stacked mountains, Huo Lie Lin." Liu Kui's note: "Folding, vibration." Li Zhouhan's note: "Folding, drum vibration." " Stack" can also be used as a quantifier to indicate layers, used for overlapping and accumulating things. "Selected Works‧ Zuo Si "Wu Du Fu": "Although the leaves are stacked, the rich and the strong one after another." Liushutong characters (7)

疊字的基本解释

疊
dié
同“叠”。

疊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dié］
［《廣韻》徒協切，入帖，定。］
亦作“曡1”。亦作“疉1”。亦作“叠1”。
(1)重叠；累积。
(2)连续；接连。
(3)折；折叠。
(4)振动；振作。
(5)轻击。参见“疊鼓”。
(6)谓综合整理。
(7)指帛叠。用棉纱织成的布。
(8)量词。层。用于重叠、累积的东西。
(9)量词。计算乐曲重奏或文辞反复遍数的单位。
(10)量词。古时号角吹十二声为一叠。
(11)量词。计算重叠堆放的东西的单位。
(12)同“碟”。盛食物的小盘。
(13)通“慴”、“懾”。恐惧。
(14)古州名。北周建德中置，治所在今甘肃省迭部县境。

疊字的康熙字典解释
疊字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
疊字的起名意思

暂无。

Stack
Basic explanation of words
Stack
dié
Same as "stack".
Stack
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dié］
["Guangyun" Apprentice Xie cut, enter the post, set. ]
Also known as "曡1". Also known as "疉1". Also called "Stack 1".
(1) Overlap; accumulation.
(2) Continuous; successive.
(3) Fold; Fold.
(4) Vibration; cheer.
(5) Tap. See "stack drum".
(6) It is called comprehensive arrangement.
(7) Refers to silk stacks. A cloth woven from cotton yarn.
(8) Quantifiers. Floor. Used for things that overlap and accumulate.
(9) Quantifiers. A unit for calculating the number of repetitions of ensemble or rhetoric.
(10) Quantifiers. In ancient times, the horn was blown twelve times in one stack.
(11) Quantifiers. Calculate the unit of stacked things.
(12) Same as "dish". A small plate of food.
(13) Through "deterrence" and "deterrence". fear.
(14) The name of the ancient state. In the Northern Zhou Dynasty, Jiande Zhongzhi was governed by Diebu County, Gansu Province.
